definition: wine doesn't make men drunk: men get themselves intoxicated. Lust does not overpower men: men surrender themselves to lust
pinyin: jiu3 bu4 zui4 ren2 ren2 zi4 zui4 , se4 bu4 mi2 ren2 ren2 zi4 mi2
containing_words.word: 酒不醉人人自醉，色不迷人人自迷

sentences.english: On summer evenings the flowers gave forth an almost intoxicating scent.
sentences.chinese: 夏夜，花朵發出幾乎醉人的芳香。

sentences.english: Do not intoxicating fragrance of the bamboo flowers, petals small, white and delicate and charming.
sentences.chinese: 竹花沒有醉人的馨香，花瓣很小，潔白而楚楚可憐。

sentences.english: Mount Langya, which stands on the southwest outskirts of Chuzhou in Anhui Province, is well known for its scenic charm.
sentences.chinese: 安徽省滁州市西南郊的琅玡山，向以山水醉人著稱。

sentences.english: Shoved open the window, the moon has hung nearby day error, good beautiful, was so intoxicant.
sentences.chinese: 推開了窗，月亮掛在天闕邊，好美，是如此得醉人。

sentences.english: The sunshine of morn in Shenzhen University is always so fascinating.
sentences.chinese: 深大清晨的陽光，總是那麼的醉人。

sentences.english: To know that a touch of wine can intoxicate my mind.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，淡淡的酒香也能醉人心頭。

sentences.english: The charming ethnic lifestyles and customs bring about colorful folk artistic entertainments.
sentences.chinese: 這些醉人的民族風情造就了豐富多彩的民間文藝。

sentences.english: Now evening what evening, in the air has filled the intoxicant happiness.
sentences.chinese: 今夕何夕，空氣裏都充滿了醉人的甜蜜。

sentences.english: Taste your lips of wine anytime night or day.
sentences.chinese: 同時品嚐你的醉人醇美的嘴脣，在任何時候。

sentences.english: If you are interested, please join with me to see this uyu intoxicating green bar.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有興趣，請隨我一起去看看這烏尤醉人的綠吧。

sentences.english: It should be sweet, very intoxicant.
sentences.chinese: 它應該是甜甜的，很醉人的。

sentences.english: This combination of challenges and opportunities is producing a fizzing cocktail of creativity.
sentences.chinese: 挑戰和機遇結緣正釀造醉人的創造力。

sentences.english: Winter night of Shanghai street is full of fascinating for warmth.
sentences.chinese: 冬夜的上海街頭爲此充滿了醉人的暖意。

sentences.english: Fabulous mango margaritas at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧裏有醉人的芒果瑪格麗塔。

sentences.english: Breeze slowly sent aromas of peach intoxicate, let a person be salivating.
sentences.chinese: 輕風徐徐送來蜜桃醉人的芳香，讓人垂涎欲滴。

sentences.english: The usually striking blue skies were white for much of the summer.
sentences.chinese: 往日藍得醉人的天空在夏天很多時候被一片白煙籠罩。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
to be infatuated with/to be drunk with/to be enchanted with/to revel in
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
